name: RUNSTABLE (whiteshampoo)
description:
Made for the Godot Wild Jam #49.

This was made with Godot 4.0 beta 1.

If you encounter any problems with the executable, please download the project-folder (or clone the git-repo) and try it in the editor itself.

R E A D M E :

You always start and will return after each level in a hubworld. Form here you can enter the levels by walking into a pool yellow sparkles.
The path to the first level is marked by an arrow. When you win a level, another sources of sparkles is revealed, but you have to search it ;)

Hint: You can hang/grab on ledges!
